Slowmode: List of commands to manage the slowmode, you must do `/slowmode <command_name>` to use them.

Slowmode.enable: Enable slowmode for a user or a role with a delay in sec, in the active channel.
Slowmode.disable: Disable slowmode for a user or role, in the active channel.
Slowmode.list: List the users in slowmode, in the active channel.

Tools: List of different useful things to know about the bot.
